name: BitcoinNewsNetwork
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: BNN is the place where you can come every day to find out how Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, and Litecoin are doing. Prices, news, and all of the latest in one flash briefing!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
